2

[You]409-you are the alpha . Adorn [yourself]409-you with symbols of [your]409-you superiority . ~The [Max Hilton]97-max Playbook : Ten Golden Rules for Landing [the Hottest Girl]410-the hottest girl in [the Room

Mia]298-the room mia Two hours later , [Max]97-max ’s dart - porcupined face is a distant memory . There is something new on the wall : a giant chart made up of taped - together sheets of butcher paper that [Lizzie]76-lizzie borrowed from [an artist on [the third floor]413-the third floor]412-an artist on the third floor . Across the top , in heavy blue magic marker , [Kelsey]80-kelsey has written Operation Bring [Max Hilton]97-max to [his]97-max grovelly knees ! There are ten checkboxes for [his]97-max ten golden rules , which are more like techniques . The hot cold move . The power play . Pulling out the praise rug . Every time [I]0-i do a technique on [Max]97-max , [I]0-i get a checkmark . The idea is that [I]0-i ’m supposed to do at least one technique on [him]97-max per visit . And at the end of ten visits , [he]97-max ’ll be on [his]97-max knees . [I]0-i do n’t know if [I]0-i can pull it off , but it means something to [Kelsey]80-kelsey and [Jada]113-jada that [I]0-i ’m fighting for [them]414-them . And it makes [me]0-i feel like less of [a victim with these visits]415-a victim with these visits . [I]0-i point to the first box . Adorn [yourself]416-your with symbols of [your]416-your superiority . “ This one is already a problem . ”[80-kelsey] [Kelsey]80-kelsey turns to the page with the rule and reads , “ ‘ Demonstrate [your]416-your alpha status by wearing standout clothes and otherwise adorning [yourself]416-your with symbols of [your]416-your utter superiority . ’ Seems pretty straightforward . ”[80-kelsey] “ [I]80-kelsey have to wear the cat outfit . [You]80-kelsey get fired if [you]80-kelsey cover it up or do n’t wear it . 4

5

[Nice guys]623-nice guys wind up in [the friend zone]624-the friend zone . ~The [Max Hilton]97-max Playbook : [Ten Golden]27-ten golden Rules for Landing the Hottest Girl in [the Room]339-the room

8

Show [her]826-her [you]827-you ’re the one in charge by creating a system of rewards for good behavior and demerits for behavior [you]827-you do n’t like . ~The [Max Hilton Playbook]828-max hilton playbook : Ten Golden Rules for Landing the Hottest Girl in [the Room]339-the room

Mia [I]0-i attend an acting seminar over the weekend and take off Monday to do some work as [a film extra]830-a film extra , which goes late into the evening . [I]0-i do n’t get [home]561-home until after three in the morning , which [I]0-i ’m a little unhappy about . [I]0-i wanted to be well rested for Tuesday . [I]0-i do n’t know how to feel about the way [he]97-max touched [me]0-i on Friday . All weekend [I]0-i ’ve been processing it , which is basically a euphemism for replaying it over and over in [my]0-i mind as butterflies do loop - de - loops in [my]0-i chest . Today [I]0-i ’ll be doing rewards and demerits . [He]97-max ’ll hate it . [I]0-i smile whenever [I]0-i imagine how much [he]97-max ’ll hate it . In [his]97-max book , [Max]97-max suggests giving [the woman]359-the woman a [Hershey]159-hershey ’s Kiss whenever [she]359-the woman does something [you]833-you like . To get [her]359-the woman to associate pleasure with being agreeable . “ What the hell ! ”[80-kelsey] [Kelsey]80-kelsey had exclaimed when [I]0-i read that part aloud . “ Like [we]2332-we ’re [Pavlov]160-pavlov ’s dogs ? ”[80-kelsey] Tell [her]359-the woman playfully that [she]359-the woman has to earn [her]359-the woman chocolate candy . [She]359-the woman wo n’t like it and will probably find ways to resist , but hold [your]833-you ground . Do what [you]833-you need to do to stay in the alpha position — [you]833-you are [the judge of [her]359-the woman]834-the judge of her , [the one who gives rewards for good behavior]835-the one who gives rewards for good behavior . 19

[The world]254-the world is [your]1535-your cocktail party ; never forget it . ~The [Max Hilton]97-max Playbook : Ten Golden Rules for Landing [the Hottest Girl in [the Room

Max]1044-the room max]1536-the hottest girl in the room max [I]0-i hit the button for [[my]0-i penthouse]1538-my penthouse , relieved to have [Mia]80-kelsey all to [myself]0-i without the eyes of the world on [us]1539-us . There ’s just one thing missing , ”[80-kelsey] [she]80-kelsey says . “ What could be missing ? ”[80-kelsey] [I]0-i go to [her]80-kelsey and cage [her]80-kelsey with [my]0-i arms . [I]0-i love [her]80-kelsey sassy smile . [I]0-i love that [she]80-kelsey gives [me]0-i shit about the Max Hilton lines . “ What could it be ? ”[80-kelsey] [she]80-kelsey teases . [I]0-i shut [her]80-kelsey up with a kiss . [She]80-kelsey grabs [my]0-i shirt , pulls [me]0-i in hard . [I]0-i ’m stunned all over again at how well [we]1540-we fit . [He]72-max throws [me]0-i down and crawls over [me]0-i , and [we]1871-we make love by the moonlight . Later [we]1871-we ’re just lying there , looking out over [the city]2036-the city . [He]72-max wraps [his]72-max arms around [me]0-i and kisses the top of [my]0-i head . “ What are [you]72-max thinking ? ”[72-max] “ [I]72-max ’m thinking about amending the grade for [[your]72-max tower]2335-your tower to five stars . ”[72-max] “ [I]72-max want ten stars . Then [he]72-max kisses [me]0-i . And [I]0-i think that there are not enough stars .

Thank [you]1874-you for reading [Max]72-max & [Mia]80-kelsey ’s story ! [I]0-i hope [you]1874-you enjoyed reading about them as much as [I]0-i loved writing about them .

Breaking the Billionaire ’s Rules

[Max Hilton]97-max is [[my]0-i high school nemesis turned [billionaire]260-billionaire]259-my high school nemesis turned billionaire . And tomorrow [I]0-i deliver [his]97-max lunch order .

In a cat costume .

[You]1874-you know [he]97-max ’s going to love it . [He]97-max ’ll smile that smirky smile , sitting there all superior in [[his]97-max gleaming tower]262-his gleaming tower , [the wealthiest and most notorious playboy in all of [New York]49-new york]1885-the wealthiest and most notorious playboy in all of new york , [the king of everything]1886-the king of everything .

Turns out it was n’t curiosity that killed the cat — it was mortification .

[I]0-i ’m almost ready to quit [my]0-i lunch delivery job , but then [[my]0-i roommate]299-my roommate tosses [me]0-i a copy of The [Max Hilton]97-max Playbook : [Ten Golden Rules]67-ten golden rules for Picking up the Hottest Girl in [the Room]339-the room . [I]0-i ’m going to use [his]97-max own techniques against [him]97-max . [I]0-i ’ll wrap [him]97-max around [my]0-i little finger , bring [him]97-max to [his]97-max knees , and crush [his]97-max steely heart . But seeing [Max]97-max every day , [I]0-i ’m discovering a side of [him]97-max [I]0-i did n’t even know existed -- [he]97-max ’s not [the jerky guy [I]0-i thought [he]97-max was]1891-the jerky guy i thought he was . Falling for [him]97-max was not in [my]0-i plan .

Am [I]0-i breaking [his]97-max rules or will [his]97-max rules break [me]0-i first ?
